mainObjective: Uncover the origin and purpose of the Silver Vein River’s unnatural magic by exploring the haunted moorlands, confronting the regret-bound queen’s spirit, and recovering ancient relics from the ruined city of Calamyr before the river’s curse reshapes the fate of all who dwell nearby.

plotPoints.title: Arrival in the Sablemoor Reaches
plotPoints.description: Laura and Norn arrive at the edge of the Sablemoor Reaches, a mist-wreathed expanse notorious for haunting whispers and unnatural mists. Locals warn travelers away, but the party seeks the tormented spirit, Rilith the Riverbound, to uncover the source of the moor’s unrest. Their first challenge is to navigate the treacherous terrain and gain the trust of the wary inhabitants.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Establishes the moor's dangers, introduces key NPCs (Mira the Moorwise, Old Fenrick), and presents the first clues about the haunting whispers.

sideQuests.title: The Hermit's Warning
sideQuests.description: Old Fenrick, a reclusive hermit, claims to know safe paths through the moor but demands a favor: retrieve his lost family brooch from a nearby sinkhole haunted by will-o'-wisps.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Completing this task grants the party a moor map and protective talisman, making navigation easier.

sideQuests.title: Moorwise’s Riddle
sideQuests.description: Mira the Moorwise offers cryptic guidance—if the party can solve her riddle about the land’s history, she’ll reveal a hidden shortcut to the riverbanks.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Solving the riddle reduces travel time and gives the party insight into the ancient tragedy of Calamyr.

plotPoints.title: The Whispering Riverbanks
plotPoints.description: The party descends into the fog-laden riverbanks, where spectral voices grow louder and strange phenomena threaten to overwhelm the senses. They must investigate the source of the voices, interacting with the ghostly Sister Amara and the enigmatic Dren of the Blue Flame, while fending off physical and spiritual dangers.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Reveals that the haunting is tied to a curse placed by Queen Seralyth. Sets up a rivalry with Professor Halvane, whose expedition has its own motives.

sideQuests.title: Blue Flame Bargain
sideQuests.description: Dren of the Blue Flame offers rare knowledge in exchange for help retrieving a lost relic from a sunken shrine, but warns of vengeful river spirits.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Aids in understanding the curse's origin; may grant the party an ally or draw the ire of the Hollow Host.

sideQuests.title: Rival Expeditions
sideQuests.description: Professor Halvane’s mercenaries set traps and spread misinformation. The party can sabotage their efforts or attempt an uneasy truce.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Influences later confrontations with Halvane and resource availability in the ruins.

plotPoints.title: Ruins of Calamyr
plotPoints.description: Deep in the river-concealed ruins, the party uncovers remnants of the lost city of Calamyr. Here, they must navigate ancient traps, decipher forgotten lore with Archivist Lareth, and contend with Captain Veylan’s mercenaries. The true nature of Rilith’s torment is revealed, forcing the party to make difficult choices about breaking or upholding the curse.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The party secures the means to commune with Rilith, but their actions may awaken Queen Seralyth or trigger conflict with rival factions.

sideQuests.title: The Lost Chronicle
sideQuests.description: Archivist Lareth seeks help recovering the Calamyr Chronicle, a tome hidden in a trapped vault. He’ll offer crucial lore about Rilith and Seralyth if aided.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides ritual components and options for communicating with spirits; opens up peaceful or combative solutions.

sideQuests.title: Mercenary Standoff
sideQuests.description: Captain Veylan’s band corners the party. The heroes can negotiate, bribe, fight, or trick the mercenaries to proceed.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Affects access to certain ruin chambers and sets up possible reinforcements for the final confrontation.

plotPoints.title: Shadows Unbound: The Riverbound’s Fate
plotPoints.description: With the means to commune with Rilith, the party enacts the ritual, confronting both the tormented spirit and the vengeful Queen Seralyth. Their choices—appeasement, cleansing, bargaining, or combat—determine the fate of the moor and its spirits. The outcome reshapes relationships with rival factions and the supernatural balance of the region.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Concludes the main story. The party’s decisions can free, redeem, or doom Rilith and the moor, with lasting campaign consequences.

sideQuests.title: Queen’s Judgment
sideQuests.description: Before the ritual, Queen Seralyth offers a dangerous pact: serve her cause and she will lift the curse from Rilith, but at a dread cost.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Allying or opposing Seralyth drastically alters the ending and future plot hooks.

plotPoints.title: Beneath the Moor's Veil
plotPoints.description: Upon arrival in the Sablemoor Reaches, Laura and Norn are greeted by Mira the Moorwise, a cryptic guide who warns them of ethereal whispers and spectral sightings along the ancient riverbanks. The party must investigate the source of these disturbances, navigating treacherous bogs, uncovering cairns, and seeking the wisdom of the local hermit, Old Fenrick. Their initial discoveries hint at a deeper, ancient curse linked to the vanished kingdom of Calamyr.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Sets the scene, introduces the central mystery and objectives, and establishes key NPCs. Player choices in who to trust (Mira vs. Fenrick), and what clues to pursue, will affect future alliances and information available.

sideQuests.title: The Hermit's Folly
sideQuests.description: Old Fenrick believes a relic he once unearthed is the source of the whispers. Recover his lost amulet from the sunken Cairn of Scriven, avoiding (or appeasing) the hostile marsh spirits within.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Securing the amulet provides insight into the Calamyr curse and earns Fenrick's trust, offering an additional clue for the main quest.

sideQuests.title: Spectral Watchers
sideQuests.description: Local trappers are plagued by pale, watching figures at dusk. Investigate the phenomenon, which may lead to an early encounter with Rilith the Riverbound, hinting at the spirits' true nature.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Successful investigation provides a vision or direct communication from Rilith, revealing part of the curse’s origin.

plotPoints.title: The Riverbound Pact
plotPoints.description: Guided by clues and visions, Laura and Norn follow the haunting whispers to the Whispering Riverbanks, where lingering spirits are trapped by an ancient pact. Here, the party must negotiate or confront Rilith the Riverbound, whose torment holds the key to unraveling the curse. The river itself is restless—crossing requires skill, diplomacy, or force, as the spirits attempt to communicate their sorrow and unfinished business.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Choices made here (combat, negotiation, or ritual) impact how the spirits will react in the climax. Rilith’s fate determines whether the spirits become allies, obstacles, or tragic bystanders.

sideQuests.title: Offerings at the Weir
sideQuests.description: A local river priestess, Sister Amara, begs for help sanctifying a defiled shrine. Restoring the weir calms the river’s wrath, making future travel safer and winning spiritual favor.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Completing the ritual offers the party divine boons or information. Refusal or failure may strengthen river-based hazards.

sideQuests.title: The Rival's Claim
sideQuests.description: Professor Halvane’s expedition scours the river for relics, risking calamity by disturbing ancient wards. Intervene to prevent them from releasing hostile spirits or losing vital artifacts.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Negotiation or confrontation affects future encounters with Halvane and the flow of magical energies during the climax.

plotPoints.title: Secrets of the Silver Veins
plotPoints.description: With the spirits' guidance—or wrath—Laura and Norn discover the entrance to the Ruins of Calamyr. Within the labyrinthine halls, they must uncover records protected by Archivist Lareth and outwit rival mercenaries led by Captain Veylan. The truth emerges: Queen Seralyth’s ancient pact with river spirits split the land, dooming her people to restless undeath unless her crown is reclaimed and her regrets addressed.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Securing the crown and learning the true tale of Queen Seralyth sets the narrative for the final confrontation—potentially offering peaceful resolution, dreadful battle, or tragic sacrifice.

sideQuests.title: The Silver Ledger
sideQuests.description: Archivist Lareth seeks the lost Silver Ledger, a tome that details the downfall of Calamyr. Recover it from a trapped chamber, facing animated remnants of the past.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides critical historical details and potential leverage in the final negotiation with Seralyth.

sideQuests.title: Mercenary Intrigue
sideQuests.description: Captain Veylan’s mercenaries are split—some wish to aid the party, others to betray them. Persuade or expose the traitors to gain allies or avoid an ambush.
sideQuests.plotImpact: The party’s actions impact the climactic encounter's difficulty and available support.

plotPoints.title: The Queen's Lament
plotPoints.description: At the heart of the ruins, Laura and Norn confront Queen Seralyth’s anguished spirit. The final confrontation can play out as battle, negotiation, or a complex ritual of atonement—depending on the party’s choices and alliances. The fate of the Sablemoor Reaches, its spirits, and the ancient curse is decided here.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Resolution echoes throughout Sablemoor. Peace may return, the spirits may be set free, or a new curse may take root—based on the party's actions and accumulated boons or grudges.

sideQuests.title: The Riverbound's Vow
sideQuests.description: If Rilith was aided earlier, she offers a final blessing—or if spurned, seeks vengeance. Help her complete her vow to the Queen, altering the balance of power in the spirit realm.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Determines the spirits’ involvement and may sway the Queen’s decision in the climax.

sideQuests.title: The Flames Below
sideQuests.description: Dren of the Blue Flame appears, offering forbidden knowledge to twist the curse for personal gain. Accept or reject this power, with far-reaching consequences.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Choosing Dren’s aid can change the nature of the curse and the party’s reputation.

plotPoints.title: Murmurs in the Moor
plotPoints.description: The party arrives at the Sablemoor Reaches, where rumors swirl of strange lights and haunting whispers along the Whispering Riverbanks. Mira the Moorwise, an enigmatic guide, offers to lead the party through the treacherous moors, but warns of restless spirits and rival treasure seekers. Old Fenrick, a superstitious hermit, may provide cryptic insight about a hidden shrine if convinced to trust the party.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Introduces the location and key NPCs. Player choices in gaining Fenrick’s trust or negotiating with Mira influence the information and advantages available for later encounters.

sideQuests.title: The Hermit's Secret
sideQuests.description: Old Fenrick is haunted by visions of the Riverbound spirit, Rilith. If convinced to trust the party, Fenrick will reveal the existence of a pathway to the hidden shrine and warn of spectral dangers.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Unlocks a safer route through the moors, reducing hazards in the next plot point.

sideQuests.title: The Moorwise’s Bargain
sideQuests.description: Mira the Moorwise offers to guide the party in exchange for help cleansing a corrupted willow grove. Completing this task earns her favor and local knowledge.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides a magical token for use against moor spirits or rival explorers.

plotPoints.title: The Whispering Riverbanks
plotPoints.description: Guided by clues and the local guides, the party navigates the Whispering Riverbanks. They must contend with supernatural phenomena – ethereal whispers, illusions, and vengeful spirits. A rival expedition led by Professor Halvane is also searching for the shrine, setting up tense encounters or possible alliances.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Choices in dealing with rivals and spirits affect future enemy strength, available allies, and potential complications.

sideQuests.title: Echoes of Regret
sideQuests.description: The tormented spirit Rilith haunts the banks, seeking resolution for past wrongs. Helping Rilith find peace can lessen the river’s supernatural dangers.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Reduces the number or severity of spirit encounters in the shrine.

sideQuests.title: Rivalry or Alliance
sideQuests.description: Professor Halvane and his mercenaries offer the chance for uneasy alliance or competition. Negotiation, sabotage, or cooperation each have consequences for the race to the shrine.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Potentially gains an ally or creates an additional adversary in the shrine area.

plotPoints.title: The Shrine’s Threshold
plotPoints.description: The party reaches the hidden shrine, a half-submerged ruin overgrown with willows. Powerful wards and puzzles bar entry, left by the Riverbound Circle. Inside, ancient spirits and magical traps guard the relic. The approach may be contested by Halvane’s group or haunted by the spirit of Rilith if left unresolved.
plotPoints.plotImpact: Player choices in exploration, puzzle-solving, and handling hostile presences determine their preparedness for the final confrontation.

sideQuests.title: Riverbound Rituals
sideQuests.description: Sister Amara requests the party perform a cleansing ritual to appease the ancient guardians within the shrine. Success may calm the spirits and weaken Queen Seralyth’s influence.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Lowers the difficulty of the final battle or grants a boon.

sideQuests.title: The Blue Flame’s Secret
sideQuests.description: Dren of the Blue Flame offers hidden knowledge in exchange for assistance escaping from the Hollow Host’s pursuit. Freeing Dren uncovers a hidden passage or vital secret within the shrine.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Provides a shortcut or secret information about the relic’s defenses.

plotPoints.title: Queen Seralyth’s Judgment
plotPoints.description: Within the heart of the shrine, the party faces Queen Seralyth’s cursed spirit. Seralyth challenges them through a mix of combat, negotiation, and trials of will, testing their intentions and the choices made throughout the adventure. The outcome will shape the fate of the relic and the spirits bound to the river.
plotPoints.plotImpact: The players’ actions determine whether Seralyth is appeased, banished, or remains a vengeful force, and who ultimately claims the relic. Choices ripple out to the wider region.

sideQuests.title: The Cursed Coronation
sideQuests.description: A hidden chamber reveals Seralyth’s crown, the key to freeing or binding her spirit. Deciding the crown’s fate dramatically alters the endgame.
sideQuests.plotImpact: Can end the confrontation peacefully or grant access to unique rewards.
